channel.title: Seeking a team, for a remake
channel.description:
[i]You're not going to get paid, as of now.[/i]
I'm currently seeking a group of intelligent individuals that would like to be part of a big project.
[i]The positions, that are available, for our project are:[/i]
[ol][li]Server Developer[/li] [li]Client Developer[/li] [li]Website Developer[/li] [li]Community Manager[/li] [li]Graphics Designer[/li] [li]Server Moderators[/li][/ol]
[spoiler=Application & Requirements] [b]Requirements:[/b] Must have at-least [u]four[/u] hours of free time. Must have been in the RSPS scene for at-least [u]one[/u] year. Must be at-least [u]thirteen[/u] years old.
[b]Application:[/b]
[ul][li]First Name, Last Name:[/li] [li]Age:[/li] [li]Sex:[/li] [li]Country:[/li] [li]How long have you been on the field, you're signing up for:[/li] [li]Why should you be part of the team?[i](Write at-least [u]4[/u] sentences):[/i][/li] [li]Contact[i](Email only):[/i][/li] [li]Any previous work?[i](Images, or proof of some sort)[/i]:[/li][/ul]
[/spoiler]
[b]We also need a sponsor[/b], who's willing to pay for the website. You will be paid back.

item.title: Seeking a team, for a remake
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:2, topic:544666”]First Name, Last Name: I’ll tell you later
Age: 16
Sex: Male
Country: U.S. (Central Time)
How long have you been on the field, you’re signing up for: Since 2006-2007 probably.
Why should you be part of the team?(Write at-least 4 sentences): What is this an essay? I’m only doing this because I think i would be fun to do, really. Why are you even asking me for this reason for joining? Will it really help your evaluation of how good I am for this team? If you want a full answer, then I will say that I want to be apart of this ‘team’ because it is open for positions.
Contact(Email only): I’ll tell you later.
Any previous work?(Images, or proof of some sort): What do you want me to show you a picture of? A server? A picture of the code? If you want to see some of my work, challenge me with something to program, don’t ask for my previous work because the only things I can show you that are online are terrible.

Umm. A remake? I’m assuming it’s 2006 because that’s what everyone else is trying to do. Anyways, what’s with the personal details for your application.

Name, sex, and country are kind of a bit too much to ask. It’s just not useful information really, country maybe, but timezone would be better. Name and sex have nothing to do with it, I could literally enter anything into these fields and it won’t matter because we won’t meet in person or anything like that.

Oh, and also you are not even asking what they’re trying to sign up for. And this is a serious application, not a troll.[/quote]

Sorry about the late response, was very busy.

Read full topic
item.source: Seeking a team, for a remake

item.title: Seeking a team, for a remake
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

First Name, Last Name: I’ll tell you later
Age: 16
Sex: Male
Country: U.S. (Central Time)
How long have you been on the field, you’re signing up for: Since 2006-2007 probably.
Why should you be part of the team?(Write at-least 4 sentences): What is this an essay? I’m only doing this because I think i would be fun to do, really. Why are you even asking me for this reason for joining? Will it really help your evaluation of how good I am for this team? If you want a full answer, then I will say that I want to be apart of this ‘team’ because it is open for positions.
Contact(Email only): I’ll tell you later.
Any previous work?(Images, or proof of some sort): What do you want me to show you a picture of? A server? A picture of the code? If you want to see some of my work, challenge me with something to program, don’t ask for my previous work because the only things I can show you that are online are terrible.

Umm. A remake? I’m assuming it’s 2006 because that’s what everyone else is trying to do. Anyways, what’s with the personal details for your application.

Name, sex, and country are kind of a bit too much to ask. It’s just not useful information really, country maybe, but timezone would be better. Name and sex have nothing to do with it, I could literally enter anything into these fields and it won’t matter because we won’t meet in person or anything like that.

Oh, and also you are not even asking what they’re trying to sign up for. And this is a serious application, not a troll.

Read full topic
